turns.utterance: Sometimes I wish I could live forever. I would love to see new cultures and watch society evolve.
turns.response: trust me buddy, no one wants to die.Immortality is  being exempt from death, unending existence.

turns.utterance: I would love to be a spectator, have many different lives and see how we advance as humans.
turns.response: Yea, with the way advancement is going, possess biological immortality

turns.utterance: I would volunteer to be shot through space and float through the galaxy!
turns.response: Oh yea :) with the today's science,  immortality may be achievable in the first few decades of the 21st century.

turns.utterance: Do you think so? I feel immortality is out of reach for science. It feels like a fairy tale to me but I would love to achieve it.
turns.response: First step would be to work on aging process. If science achieves breakthrough with this boom!.It would give us  humans biological immortality,

turns.utterance: I heard they are doing research on animals to test reversing age. That would be amazing. You're so knowledgeable! How do you know so much?
